Let's think step by step.

1. Copolymers - These are not "Property Name" entities. They are types of chemical compounds.
2. Distinct - This is not a "Property Name" entity. It describes the appearance of the vibronic shoulder peaks.
3. Vibronic shoulder peaks - These are the "Property Name" entities in the paragraph. They are a specific type of spectral feature in the absorption or emission spectrum of a material.
4. 710 nm - This is not a "Property Name" entity. It is a wavelength value associated with the vibronic shoulder peaks.
5. Derived - This is not a "Property Name" entity. It describes the origin of the vibronic shoulder peaks.
6. Coupling - This is not a "Property Name" entity. It describes the relationship between the electronic and vibrational transitions.
7. Electronic and vibrational transition - These are not "Property Name" entities. They are types of transitions in molecular systems.
